tool_description: Delivers patented phone-based verification and two-factor authentication using a time-based, one-time passcode sent over SMS
name: Telesign SMS Verify
title: Telesign SMS Verify

api_list.name: Send Verification Code

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: Your test phone number with no special characters or spaces.

utterances.utterance: Send a verification code 123456 to my phone number 5551234567.
I need to verify my account with code 987654 sent to 9876543210.
Please send the code 112233 to my mobile 1234567890 for app verification.
Can you send the verification code 445566 to 0987654321?
Send 778899 to my number 1112223333 for two-factor authentication.
I need the code 223344 sent to 2223334444 for my app.
Please verify my phone 3334445555 with the code 556677.
I need to receive the code 667788 on my phone 5556667777.
Send the verification code 334455 to my number 6667778888.
